Key.Original: An ATV (all-terrain vehicle) is defined as a vehicle that travels on low pressure tires, with a seat that is straddled by the operator, along with handlebars for steering control.
Key.Chinese: An ATV (all-terrain vehicle) is defined as a vehicle that travels on low pressure tires, with a seat that is straddled by the operator, along with handlebars for steering control.
Key.French: Un quad est muni de pneus basse pression, d'une selle et d'un guidon.
Key.Spanish: Un ATV (vehículo todoterreno) es un vehículo que se mueve sobre neumáticos de baja presión, con un asiento montado a horcajadas por el conductor, y manillar para guiarlo.
Key.Italian: Un ATV (All-Terrain Vehicle) è un veicolo adatto a tutti i tipi di terreno caratterizzato da gomme a bassa pressione, una sella su cui l'operatore sale a cavalcioni e un manubrio per sterzare.
Key.Hungarian: An ATV (all-terrain vehicle) is defined as a vehicle that travels on low pressure tires, with a seat that is straddled by the operator, along with handlebars for steering control.
Key.Polish: ATV (pojazd terenowy) porusza się na niskociśnieniowych oponach. Siedzenie jest rozkładane przez operatora razem z dźwigniami służącymi do kierowania.
Key.Russian: ATV - транспорт для езды по бездорожью, или мотовездеход. Имеет следующие отличительные признаки: шины, рассчитанные на низкое давление, посадка водителя верхом на сиденье, руль велосипедного типа.
Key.German: Ein ATV (All Terrain Vehicle) ist ein Fahrzeug mit Niederdruckreifen, auf dem der Fahrer mit gespreizten Beinen sitzt und mit einer Lenkstange steuert.
Key.Czech: ATV (lidově zvané 'čtyřkolka') je malé motorové vozidlo obdobné motocyklu se čtyřmi koly umístěnými na dvou nápravách a ve dvou stopách, jako u automobilu.
Key.English: An ATV (all-terrain vehicle) is defined as a vehicle that travels on low pressure tires, with a seat that is straddled by the operator, along with handlebars for steering control.
Key.Japanese: An ATV (all-terrain vehicle) is defined as a vehicle that travels on low pressure tires, with a seat that is straddled by the operator, along with handlebars for steering control.

Key.Original: A motorbike is a single-track, two-wheeled motor vehicle. It can be used for many purposes, like long distance travel, navigating congested urban traffic, cruising, sport and racing, or off-road.
Key.Chinese: A motorbike is a single-track, two-wheeled motor vehicle. It can be used for many purposes, like long distance travel, navigating congested urban traffic, cruising, sport and racing, or off-road.
Key.French: Une moto est un vehicule a deux roue. Elle peut être utilisée pour de nombreuse tâches comme les déplacements sur de longues distances, circuler dans les embouteillages, faire des courses sportives ou encore du off-road.
Key.Spanish: Una motocicleta sencilla, vehículo motorizado de dos ruedas. Puede utilizarse para un sinfín de propósitos, adecuada para largos viajes, circular por las congestionadas ciudades, deporte, carreras o incluso campo a través.
Key.Italian: Una motocicletta può essere usata per molti scopi come lunghi viaggi, evitare traffico urbano, per sport e fuoristrada.
Key.Hungarian: A motorbike is a single-track, two-wheeled motor vehicle. It can be used for many purposes, like long distance travel, navigating congested urban traffic, cruising, sport and racing, or off-road.
Key.Polish: Motocykl to jednośladowy, dwukołowy pojazd silnikowy. Ma wiele zastosowań takich jak podróże na długie dystanse, poruszanie się w zatłoczonych centrach miast, przejażdżki, wyścigi sportowe i jazda terenowa.
Key.Russian: Мотоцикл - двухколесное транспортное средство, которое используется для различных целей. Например для поездок на дальние расстояния, движения в городе, спортивных гонок и ралли.
Key.German: Ein Motorrad ist ein einspuriges motorisiertes Fahrzeug mit zwei Rädern. Es kann vielseitig eingesetzt werden, zum Beispiel für Langstrecken, zum schnelleren Vorankommen im Großstadtverkehr, für Spritztouren, im Rennsport oder als Geländefahrzeug.
Key.Czech: Motocykl je jednostopé, dvoukolové vozidlo. Využíváno je k mnoha účelům: cestování na velké vzdálenosti, cesty po městě, projížďky, sport, závodění nebo jízdu mimo vozovky.
Key.English: A motorbike is a single-track, two-wheeled motor vehicle. It can be used for many purposes, like long distance travel, navigating congested urban traffic, cruising, sport and racing, or off-road.
Key.Japanese: A motorbike is a single-track, two-wheeled motor vehicle. It can be used for many purposes, like long distance travel, navigating congested urban traffic, cruising, sport and racing, or off-road.

Key.Spanish: Red de camuflaje abierto (desierto del Este)
Cobertura de vehículo de camuflaje (desierto OTAN)
Cobertura de vehículo de camuflaje (desierto del Este)

Key.Original:
The Blackhawk is the US Army’s front-line utility helicopter used for transport roles, medical evacuation and even air support.
It is capable of carrying 11 combat-equipped soldiers. Easy to maintain in the field, the Blackhawk performs well in a variety of roles including air assault and medical evacuation.
Key.Chinese:
The Blackhawk is the US Army’s front-line utility helicopter used for transport roles, medical evacuation and even air support.
It is capable of carrying 11 combat-equipped soldiers. Easy to maintain in the field, the Blackhawk performs well in a variety of roles including air assault and medical evacuation.
Key.French:
Le Blackhawk est un hélicoptère de l'US Army utilisé pour le transport, l'évacuation sanitaire et même l'appui aérien.
Il peut embarquer onze soldats équipés pour le combat. Facile d'entretien sur le terrain, le Blackhawk se montre efficace dans des domaines aussi divers que l'assaut aérien et l'évacuation sanitaire.
Key.Spanish:
El Blackhawk es el helicóptero utilitario de primera línea del Ejército de EE. UU., usado para el transporte, la evacuación médica e incluso el apoyo aéreo.
Es capaz de transportar 11 soldados equipados para el combate. De fácil mantenimiento en el frente, el Blackhawk desempeña bien varias funciones, incluido el asalto aéreo y la evacuación médica.
Key.Italian:
Il Blackhawk è l’elicottero multiuso di prima linea dell’esercito americano, utilizzato per trasporto, evacuazione e supporto aereo.
Può trasportare fino a 11 soldati in assetto da combattimento. Facile da mantenere sul campo, il Blackhawk opera bene in molte circostanze.
Key.Hungarian:
The Blackhawk is the US Army’s front-line utility helicopter used for transport roles, medical evacuation and even air support.
It is capable of carrying 11 combat-equipped soldiers. Easy to maintain in the field, the Blackhawk performs well in a variety of roles including air assault and medical evacuation.
Key.Polish:
Blackhawk to frontowy śmigłowiec wielozadaniowy, służący do transportu, ewakuacji medycznej, a nawet wsparcia powietrznego.
Może przewozić 11 żołnierzy z ekwipunkiem bojowym. Blackhawk można z łatwością serwisować w polu, doskonale sprawdza się w wielu rolach, w tym jako śmigłowiec szturmowy i latający ambulans.
Key.Russian:
'Блэк Хоук' (дословно 'Черный Ястреб') - американский армейский вертолёт общего назначения, предназначенный для действий в передовом районе, от транспортировки до огневой поддержки с воздуха.
Вертолет может переносить 11 солдат в полном снаряжении. Легкий в обслуживании, 'Черный Ястреб' используется как для сброса воздущного десанта, так и для эвакуации раненых.
Key.German:
Der Blackhawk ist der Vielzweckhelikopter der US-Armee für den Fronteinsatz. Er übernimmt Transportaufgaben, sorgt für medizinische Evakuierungen und leistet sogar Luftunterstützung.
Er kann 11 Soldaten mit Kampfausrüstung aufnehmen. Der Blackhawk ist im Feld leicht zu unterhalten und übernimmt zahlreiche Aufgaben, darunter Luftlandeangriffe und medizinische Evakuierungen.
Key.Czech:
Blackhawk (Černý jestřáb) je americký víceúčelový vrtulník užívaný k vzdušné přepravě, záchraně vojenských jednotek i civilních osob, i jako vzdušná podpora.
UH-60M je schopen nést až 11 vojáků s plnou výbavou. Blackhawk je považován za skvělý stroj, schopný plnit celou řadu různých úkolů na bojišti i během mírových operací.
Key.English:
The Blackhawk is the US Army’s front-line utility helicopter used for transport roles, medical evacuation and even air support.
It is capable of carrying 11 combat-equipped soldiers. Easy to maintain in the field, the Blackhawk performs well in a variety of roles including air assault and medical evacuation.
Key.Japanese:
The Blackhawk is the US Army’s front-line utility helicopter used for transport roles, medical evacuation and even air support.
It is capable of carrying 11 combat-equipped soldiers. Easy to maintain in the field, the Blackhawk performs well in a variety of roles including air assault and medical evacuation.

Key.Original: The UH-1 Iroquois is a multipurpose military helicopter, famous for its use in the Vietnam War. The UH-1H is the most-produced version. There were more than 16,000 made in total, of which about 7,000 saw use during the Vietnam War.
Key.Chinese: The UH-1 Iroquois is a multipurpose military helicopter, famous for its use in the Vietnam War. The UH-1H is the most-produced version. There were more than 16,000 made in total, of which about 7,000 saw use during the Vietnam War.
Key.French: L'UH-1 Iroquois est un hélicoptère militaire polyvalent devenu célèbre lors de la guerre du Vietnam. L'UH-1H fut la version la plus produite. Au total, plus de 16 000 exemplaires sortirent des chaînes d'assemblage, dont environ 7 000 furent utilisés pendant la guerre du Vietnam.
Key.Spanish: El UH-1 Iroquois es un helicóptero militar multipropósito, famoso por su uso en la Guerra de Vietnam. El UH-1H es la versión más fabricada. Se hicieron más de 16.000 en total, de los que 7.000 se usaron en la Guerra de Vietnam.
Key.Italian: L'UH-1 Iroquois è un elicottero militare multiuso ben noto nella guerra del Vietnam. Il modello più prodotto è l'UH-1H. Delle 16.000 unità realizzate in totale, 7.000 sono state impiegate in Vietnam.
Key.Hungarian: The UH-1 Iroquois is a multipurpose military helicopter, famous for its use in the Vietnam War. The UH-1H is the most-produced version. There were more than 16,000 made in total, of which about 7,000 saw use during the Vietnam War.
Key.Polish: UH-1 Iroquois to wielozadaniowy śmigłowiec wojskowy, który zasłynął podczas wojny w Wietnamie. UH-1H to najliczniej produkowana wersja. Powstało ich ponad 16000, z czego około 7000 latało w wojnie wietnamskiej.
Key.Russian: UH-1 'Ирокез' - многоцелевой военный вертолет, прославившийся во время войны во Вьетнаме. Вертолеты семейства UH-1 являются одними из самых массовых: всего их было произведено порядка 16000, и примерно 7000 были задействованы во Вьетнаме.
Key.German: Der UH-1 Iroquois ist ein militärischer Vielzweckhelikopter, der vor allem durch seinen Einsatz im Vietnam-Krieg bekannt wurde. Die meisthergestellte Version ist der UH-1H. Es gab davon insgesamt über 16.000, von denen etwa 7.000 im Vietnam-Krieg eingesetzt wurden.
Key.Czech: UH-1 Iroquois je americký víceúčelový vrtulník, který se proslavil během války ve Vietnamu. UH-1H je jeho nejrozšířenější variantou. Odhaduje se, že jich bylo vyrobeno na 16.000, z nichž zhruba 7.000 se zúčastnilo války ve Vietnamu.
Key.English: The UH-1 Iroquois is a multipurpose military helicopter, famous for its use in the Vietnam War. The UH-1H is the most-produced version. There were more than 16,000 made in total, of which about 7,000 saw use during the Vietnam War.
Key.Japanese: The UH-1 Iroquois is a multipurpose military helicopter, famous for its use in the Vietnam War. The UH-1H is the most-produced version. There were more than 16,000 made in total, of which about 7,000 saw use during the Vietnam War.

Key.Original:
The MH-6 Little Bird is a light observation helicopter. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The MH-6J is the improved special forces transport version of MH-6.
Key.Chinese:
The MH-6 Little Bird is a light observation helicopter. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The MH-6J is the improved special forces transport version of MH-6.
Key.French:
Le MH-6 Little Bird est un hélicoptère d'observation léger. Cet appareil monomoteur est utilisé lors des opérations spéciales de l'US Army.
Le MH-6J correspond à la version améliorée dédiée au transport des forces spéciales.
Key.Spanish:
El MH-6 Little Bird es un helicóptero ligero de observación. Es el helicóptero ligero de motor único usado en operaciones especiales por el Ejército de EE. UU.
El MH-6J es la versión mejorada del MH-6 para transporte de fuerzas especiales.
Key.Italian:
L'MH-6 Little Bird è un elicottero da osservazione leggero a un motore usato dall'esercito americano in operazioni speciali.
L'MH-6J è la versione da trasporto migliorata per le forze speciali.
Key.Hungarian:
The MH-6 Little Bird is a light observation helicopter. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The MH-6J is the improved special forces transport version of MH-6.
Key.Polish:
MH-6 Little Bird to jednosilnikowy lekki śmigłowiec rozpoznawczy, wykorzystywany przez US Army do operacji specjalnych.
MH-6J to zmodyfikowana wersja MH-6 przeznaczona do transportu sił specjalnych.
Key.Russian:
MH-6 'Литл Берд' - небольшой разведывательный вертолет. Это одномоторный легкий вертолет авиации специального назначения США.
Версия MH-6J - транспортный вариант с улучшенными характеристиками.
Key.German:
Der MH-6 Little Bird ist ein leichter Beobachtungshelikopter. Der einmotorige Hubschrauber wird von der US-Armee für Spezialeinsätze benutzt.
Der MH-6J ist die verbesserte Transportversion des MH-6 für die Special Forces.
Key.Czech:
MH-6 Little Bird je lehký pozorovací vrtulník. Jedná se o jednomotorovou helikoptéru, kterou používá armáda Spojených států.
MH-6J je upravená transportní verze MH-6, používaná u speciálních jednotek.
Key.English:
The MH-6 Little Bird is a light observation helicopter. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The MH-6J is the improved special forces transport version of MH-6.
Key.Japanese:
The MH-6 Little Bird is a light observation helicopter. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The MH-6J is the improved special forces transport version of MH-6.

Key.Original:
The CH-47 Chinook is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Its top speed of 315 km/h was faster any comparable helicopter in the 1960s and even many of today.
The main use of the CH-47 includes troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.
Key.Chinese:
The CH-47 Chinook is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Its top speed of 315 km/h was faster any comparable helicopter in the 1960s and even many of today.
The main use of the CH-47 includes troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.
Key.French:
Le CH-47 Chinook est un hélicoptère de transport lourd, polyvalent, bimoteur et à deux rotors en tandem. Sa vitesse maximale de 315 km/h est supérieure à celle des autres hélicoptères des années 1960 et même de beaucoup d'appareils actuels.
Les principales missions du CH-47 sont le transport de troupes, d'artillerie, de munitions, de carburant et d'équipements divers sur le champ de bataille.
Key.Spanish:
El CH-47 Chinook es un versatil helicóptero bimotor con rotores en tándem, de transporte de carga pesada. Su velocidad máxima de 315 km/h era superior a la de cualquier helicóptero comparable en los años 60, e incluso a la de muchos actuales.
Los principales usos del CH-47 son el desplazamiento de tropas, emplazamiento de artillería y reabastecimiento en el campo de batalla.
Key.Italian:
Il CH-47 Chinook è un elicottero da trasporto versatile a due motori e due rotori con elevata capacità di carico. Può raggiungere i 315 km/h, superando molti elicotteri sia dell'epoca (anni '60) sia odierni.
Viene usato principalmente per il trasporto di truppe, artiglieria e munizioni sul campo di battaglia.
Key.Hungarian:
The CH-47 Chinook is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Its top speed of 315 km/h was faster any comparable helicopter in the 1960s and even many of today.
The main use of the CH-47 includes troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.
Key.Polish:
CH-47 Chinook to uniwersalny, dwusilnikowy ciężki śmigłowiec transportowy z dwoma wirnikami. Osiągał prędkość 315 km/godz., co czyniło go najszybszym śmigłowcem lat 60. Nawet dziś nie ma wielu maszyn dorównujących mu szybkością.
CH-47 są najczęściej wykorzystywane do transportu piechoty, artylerii i zaopatrzenia bojowego.
Key.Russian:
CH-47 'Чинук' - многоцелевой тяжелый военно-транспортный вертолет двухвинтовой продольной схемы. Он развивал скорость в 315 км/ч и был куда быстрее аналогичных машин в 60-е, да и по сей день такие скорости доступны не всем.
CH-47 используется, в основном, для переброски войск, организации снабжения в боевых условиях и перевозки артиллерийских орудий.
Key.German:
Der CH-47 Chinook ist ein vielseitiger, zweimotoriger Schwerlasthelikopter mit Tandem-Rotoren. Mit einer Höchstgeschwindigkeit von 315 km/h war er schneller als alle vergleichbaren Helikopter der 1960er Jahre und sogar als viele Modelle von heute.
Die Hauptaufgaben des CH-47 sind der Transport von Truppen und Artillerie sowie die Nachschubversorgung auf dem Schlachtfeld.
Key.Czech:
CH-47 Chinook je americký dvourotorový těžký transportní vrtulník. Je schopen dosáhnout rychlosti až 315 km/h, díky čemuž byl nejrychlejším strojem svého druhu v 60. letech - tedy v době svého prvního nasazení - a dodnes patří k nadprůměru.
Mezi hlavní úlohy CH-47 patří transport vojáků, dělostřelectva a zásob.
Key.English:
The CH-47 Chinook is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Its top speed of 315 km/h was faster any comparable helicopter in the 1960s and even many of today.
The main use of the CH-47 includes troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.
Key.Japanese:
The CH-47 Chinook is a versatile, twin-engine, tandem rotor heavy-lift helicopter. Its top speed of 315 km/h was faster any comparable helicopter in the 1960s and even many of today.
The main use of the CH-47 includes troop movement, artillery emplacement and battlefield resupply.

Key.Original:
The Antonov An-2 (NATO reporting name Colt) is a Soviet single-engine biplane utility/agricultural aircraft produced since 1946.
The An-2 was used as combat planes in the Korean and Vietnam wars and as naval interceptors.
Key.Chinese:
The Antonov An-2 (NATO reporting name Colt) is a Soviet single-engine biplane utility/agricultural aircraft produced since 1946.
The An-2 was used as combat planes in the Korean and Vietnam wars and as naval interceptors.
Key.French:
L'Antonov An-2 (baptisé Colt dans la codification OTAN) est un biplan monomoteur soviétique utilitaire/agricole produit à partir de 1946.
L'An-2 fut utilisé comme avion de combat lors des guerres de Corée et du Vietnam ainsi que comme intercepteur naval.
Key.Spanish:
El Antonov An-2 (designación OTAN: Colt) es un biplano utilitario/agrícola soviético de motor único, producido desde 1946.
El An-2 se usó como avión de combate en las guerras de Corea y Vietnam, y como interceptor naval.
Key.Italian:
L'Antonov An-2, denominazione NATO "Colt", è un biplano a un motore per uso vario e agricolo prodotto dal 1946.
Nelle guerre di Corea e Vietnam è stato impiegato come aereo d'attacco e per intercettare le navi.
Key.Hungarian:
The Antonov An-2 (NATO reporting name Colt) is a Soviet single-engine biplane utility/agricultural aircraft produced since 1946.
The An-2 was used as combat planes in the Korean and Vietnam wars and as naval interceptors.
Key.Polish:
Antonow An-2 (kryptonim NATO: Źrebak) to radziecki, jednosilnikowy dwupłatowy samolot użytkowy/rolniczy, produkowany od 1946 r.
An-2 wykorzystywano jako samoloty bojowe w czasie wojen w Korei i Wietnamie. Służyły też jako maszyny przechwytujące marynarki wojennej.
Key.Russian:
Ан-2 - это советский легкий многоцелевой одномоторный винтовой самолет, выполненный по схеме 'биплан', пошедший в серийное производство в 1947г. Благодаря широчайшему набору вариантов применения, надежности конструкции, хорошим ЛТХ, а также простоте освоения и производства, Ан-2 продолжает серийно выпускаться и по настоящее время (в КНР), что делает его рекордсменом по данному показателю в мировой авиации.
Данная модификация, Ан-2ТП, является транспортно-пассажирской, предназначенной для перевозки как людей, так и грузов.
Key.German:
Die Antonow An-2 (NATO-Codename: Colt) ist ein sowjetischer, einmotoriger Doppeldecker für landwirtschaftliche und ähnliche Aufgaben, der ab 1946 produziert wurde.
Im Korea- und im Vietnam-Krieg wurde die An-2 als Kampfflugzeug und Abfangjäger auf See eingesetzt.
Key.Czech:
Antonov An-2 (NATO označení je Colt) jednomotorový celokovový užitkový/zemědělský dvouplošník, vyráběný od roku 1946.
Stroje An-2 byly během Korejské války a války ve Vietnamu využívány u vojenského letectva a námořnictva.
Key.English:
The Antonov An-2 (NATO reporting name Colt) is a Soviet single-engine biplane utility/agricultural aircraft produced since 1946.
The An-2 was used as combat planes in the Korean and Vietnam wars and as naval interceptors.
Key.Japanese:
The Antonov An-2 (NATO reporting name Colt) is a Soviet single-engine biplane utility/agricultural aircraft produced since 1946.
The An-2 was used as combat planes in the Korean and Vietnam wars and as naval interceptors.

Key.Original:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is a single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6X is an unmanned variant of the AH-6 and is used as a UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.Chinese:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is a single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6X is an unmanned variant of the AH-6 and is used as a UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.French:
L'AH-6 est la version d'attaque du MH-6 Little Bird. Il s'agit d'un hélicoptère léger monomoteur utilisé lors des opérations spéciales de l'US Army.
L'AH-6X est une version sans équipage de l'AH-6 utilisée comme drone.
Key.Spanish:
El AH-6 es una variante de ataque del MH-6 Little Bird. Es un helicóptero ligero de motor único, usado en operaciones especiales por el Ejército de EE. UU.
El AH-6X es una variante no tripulada del AH-6, y se usa como UAV (Vehículo Aéreo No Tripulado).
Key.Italian:
L'AH-6 è la versione d'attacco dell'MH-6 Little Bird, usato dall'esercito americano in operazioni speciali.
L'AH-6X è la versione senza pilota UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.Hungarian:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is a single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6X is an unmanned variant of the AH-6 and is used as a UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.Polish:
AH-6 jest wersją szturmową MH-6 Little Bird. To jednosilnikowy śmigłowiec lekki, wykorzystywany przez US Army do operacji specjalnych.
AH-6X to bezzałogowa wersja AH-6, wykorzystywana jako BSP (Bezzałogowy Statek Powietrzny).
Key.Russian:
AH-6 - вариация MH-6 'Литл Берд', использующаяся преимущественно для огневой поддержки. Это одномоторный легкий вертолет авиации специального назначения США.
AH-6X - беспилотная версия AH-6 и используется как БЛА (беспилотный летательный аппарат).
Key.German:
Der AH-6 ist eine Kampfversion des MH-6 Little Bird. Der einmotorige Hubschrauber wird von der US-Armee für Spezialeinsätze benutzt.
Der AH-6X ist eine unbemannte Variante des AH-6 und wird als UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.Czech:
AH-6 je útočnou variantou helikoptéry MH-6 Little Bird. Jde o jednomotorový lehký vrtulník využívaný americkou armádou pro speciální operace.
AH-6X je bezpilotní variantou klasické AH-6 a používá se jako UAV (bezpilotní letoun).
Key.English:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is a single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6X is an unmanned variant of the AH-6 and is used as a UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).
Key.Japanese:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is a single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6X is an unmanned variant of the AH-6 and is used as a UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle).

Key.Original:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6J is the improved special forces attack version of AH-6.
Key.Chinese:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6J is the improved special forces attack version of AH-6.
Key.French:
L'AH-6 est la version d'attaque du MH-6 Little Bird. Cet appareil monomoteur est utilisé lors des opérations spéciales de l'US Army.
L'AH-6J correspond à la version d'attaque améliorée de l'AH-6 dédiée aux forces spéciales.
Key.Spanish:
El AH-6 es una variante de ataque del MH-6 Little Bird. Es un helicóptero ligero de motor único, usado en operaciones especiales por el Ejército de EE. UU.
El AH-6J es la versión de ataque mejorada del AH-6 de las fuerzas especiales.
Key.Italian:
L'AH-6 è la versione d'attacco dell'MH-6 Little Bird, usato dall'esercito americano in operazioni speciali.
L'AH-6J è la versione d'attacco migliorata per le forze speciali.
Key.Hungarian:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6J is the improved special forces attack version of AH-6.
Key.Polish:
AH-6 jest wersją szturmową MH-6 Little Bird. To jednosilnikowy śmigłowiec lekki, wykorzystywany przez US Army do operacji specjalnych.
AH-6J to zmodyfikowana, szturmowa wersja AH-6, przeznaczona dla sił specjalnych.
Key.Russian:
AH-6 - штурмовой вариант MH-6 'Литл Берд'. Это одномоторный легкий вертолет авиации специального назначения США.
AH-6J - модернизированная версия AH-6 с улучшенными характеристиками.
Key.German:
Der AH-6 ist eine Kampfversion des MH-6 Little Bird. Der einmotorige Hubschrauber wird von der US-Armee für Spezialeinsätze benutzt.
Der AH-6J ist die verbesserte Kampfversion des AH-6 für die Special Forces.
Key.Czech:
AH-6 je útočnou variantou helikoptéry MH-6 Little Bird. Jde o jednomotorový lehký vrtulník využívaný americkou armádou pro speciální operace.
AH-6J je vylepšená útočná verze AH-6 určená pro speciální jednotky.
Key.English:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6J is the improved special forces attack version of AH-6.
Key.Japanese:
The AH-6 is an attack variant of the MH-6 Little Bird. It is the single-engine light helicopter used for special operations by the US Army.
The AH-6J is the improved special forces attack version of AH-6.

Key.Original:
The AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, two-seat, twin-engine attack helicopter. The Apache is armed with a 30mm M230 chain gun and AGM-114 Hellfire or Hydra 70 rocket pods on four hardpoints.
The AH-64 uses the double- and triple-redundant aircraft systems to improve survivability for the aircraft and crew.
Key.Chinese:
The AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, two-seat, twin-engine attack helicopter. The Apache is armed with a 30mm M230 chain gun and AGM-114 Hellfire or Hydra 70 rocket pods on four hardpoints.
The AH-64 uses the double- and triple-redundant aircraft systems to improve survivability for the aircraft and crew.
Key.French:
L'AH-64 Apache est un hélicoptère d'attaque bimoteur, biplace et doté de quatre pales. L'Apache est armé d'une mitrailleuse M230 de 30 mm et de lance-missiles AGM-114 Hellfire ou Hydra 70 répartis sur quatre points d'attache.
L'AH-64 utilise ses systèmes redondants pour améliorer la capacité de survie de l'appareil et de son équipage.
Key.Spanish:
El AH-64 Apache es un helicóptero de ataque de cola de cuatro patas, biplaza, y bimotor. El Apache está armado con un cañón automático M230 de 30 mm y con misiles AGM-114 Hellfire o lanzacohetes Hydra 70 en cuatro puntos de anclaje.
El AH-64 usa sistemas de vuelo de doble y triple redundancia para mejorar la capacidad de supervivencia de la aeronave y la tripulación.
Key.Italian:
L'AH-64 Apache è un elicottero d'attacco a due posti dotato di due motori a quattro pale, equipaggiato con cannone automatico M230 da 30 mm e lanciarazzi AGM-114 Hellfire o Hydra 70 su quattro punti di attacco.
Il sistema di sicurezza a ridondanza doppia e tripla aumenta le possibilità di sopravvivenza di velivolo ed equipaggio.
Key.Hungarian:
The AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, two-seat, twin-engine attack helicopter. The Apache is armed with a 30mm M230 chain gun and AGM-114 Hellfire or Hydra 70 rocket pods on four hardpoints.
The AH-64 uses the double- and triple-redundant aircraft systems to improve survivability for the aircraft and crew.
Key.Polish:
AH-64 Apache to dwusilnikowy, dwumiejscowy śmigłowiec szturmowy. Apache jest uzbrojony w działko 30 mm M230 i pociski rakietowe AGM-114 Hellfire lub zasobniki z pociskami Hydra 70, montowane na czterech pylonach.
AH-64 posiada podwójne i potrójne systemy, co zwiększa szanse przetrwania maszyny i załogi.
Key.Russian:
AH-64 'Апач' - четырехлопастной двухместный двухмоторный вертолет огневой поддержки. 'Апач' вооружен 30-мм пушкой M230 и ракетами AGM-114 'Хелфайр' или 'Гидра 70', подвешенными на четырех держателях.
В целях обеспечения безопасности воздушного судна и экипажа основные системы AH-64 продублированы.
Key.German:
Der AH-64 Apache ist ein vierblättriger, zweisitziger, zweimotoriger Kampfhubschrauber. Der Apache ist mit einer 30mm M230-Kettenkanone und AGM-114 Hellfire oder Hydra 70-Raketen auf vier Flügelstationen bewaffnet.
Der AH-64 benutzt doppelt- und dreifach redundante Systeme, um die Überlebenschancen von Fluggerät und Besatzung zu verbessern.
Key.Czech:
AH-64 Apache je dvousedadlový, dvoumotorový bitevní vrtulník. Apache je vyzbrojen kanónem M230 ráže 30mm a raketami AGM-114 Hellfire nebo Hydra 70.
AH-64 je velmi odolný a byl vyroben tak, aby byl schopný letu i po zásahu kalibrem 23 mm, běžně užívaným v protiletadlových systémech zemí bývalé Varšavské smlouvy.
Key.English:
The AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, two-seat, twin-engine attack helicopter. The Apache is armed with a 30mm M230 chain gun and AGM-114 Hellfire or Hydra 70 rocket pods on four hardpoints.
The AH-64 uses the double- and triple-redundant aircraft systems to improve survivability for the aircraft and crew.
Key.Japanese:
The AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, two-seat, twin-engine attack helicopter. The Apache is armed with a 30mm M230 chain gun and AGM-114 Hellfire or Hydra 70 rocket pods on four hardpoints.
The AH-64 uses the double- and triple-redundant aircraft systems to improve survivability for the aircraft and crew.

Key.Original:
The MQ-9 Reaper is an UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle). It is the first hunter-killer UAV designed for long endurance, high-altitude survelliance.
The MQ-9 is armed with 4 hardpoints, each with 2 AGM-114 Hellfire air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Chinese:
The MQ-9 Reaper is an UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle). It is the first hunter-killer UAV designed for long endurance, high-altitude survelliance.
The MQ-9 is armed with 4 hardpoints, each with 2 AGM-114 Hellfire air-to-ground missiles.
Key.French:
Le MQ-9 Reaper est un drone. C'est le premier drone chasseur-tueur conçu pour l'endurance et la haute altitude.
Le MQ-9 est équipé de quatre points d'attache, chacun armé de deux missiles air-sol AGM-114 Hellfire.
Key.Spanish:
El MQ-9 Reaper es un UAV (vehículo aéreo no tripulado). Es el primer UAV de ataque diseñado para vigilancia de larga duración y gran altitud.
El MQ-9 está armado con 4 puntos de anclaje, cada uno de ellos con 2 misiles aire-tierra AGM-114 Hellfire.
Key.Italian:
L'MQ-9 Reaper è il primo elicottero UAV di tipo "hunter-killer" progettato per la sorveglianza a lunga autonomia ad elevate altitudini.
È dotato di quattro punti di attacco per coppie di missili aria-terra AGM-114 Hellfire.
Key.Hungarian:
The MQ-9 Reaper is an UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle). It is the first hunter-killer UAV designed for long endurance, high-altitude survelliance.
The MQ-9 is armed with 4 hardpoints, each with 2 AGM-114 Hellfire air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Polish:
MQ-9 Reaper to BSP (bezzałogowy statek powietrzny). To pierwszy bojowy BSP przeznaczony do długich lotów rozpoznawczych na dużym pułapie.
MQ-9 posiada cztery pylony, na każdym z nich znajdują się pod 2 pociski powietrze-ziemia AGM-114 Hellfire.
Key.Russian:
MQ-9 'Рипер' — разведывательно-ударный БПЛА. Это первый ударный БПЛА разработанный для длительного применения на больших высотах.
MQ-9 оснащен 4-мя точками подвески с 2 ракетами воздух-земля AGM-114 'Хелфайр' на каждой.
Key.German:
Der MQ-9 Reaper ist ein UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle – Unbemanntes Fluggerät). Er ist das erste stark bewaffnete UAV, das für die langfristige Überwachung aus großer Höhe entwickelt wurde.
Der MQ-9 ist mit 4 Unterflügelstationen ausgestattet, von denen jede mit 2 AGM-114 Hellfire Luft-Boden-Raketen bewaffnet ist.
Key.Czech:
MQ-9 Reaper je UAV (bezpilotní letoun). Jedná se o první stíhací UAV.
MQ-9 má k dispozici 4 zbraňové závěsníky, z nichž každý nese 2 rakety AGM-114 Hellfire.
Key.English:
The MQ-9 Reaper is an UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle). It is the first hunter-killer UAV designed for long endurance, high-altitude survelliance.
The MQ-9 is armed with 4 hardpoints, each with 2 AGM-114 Hellfire air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Japanese:
The MQ-9 Reaper is an UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle). It is the first hunter-killer UAV designed for long endurance, high-altitude survelliance.
The MQ-9 is armed with 4 hardpoints, each with 2 AGM-114 Hellfire air-to-ground missiles.

Key.Original:
T-55 tanks were the main battle tanks of the Soviet Union after they entered service in 1947. Estimated production numbers for the series range from 86,000 to 100,000, making them the most-produced tank in history.
The T-55 tanks are mechanically simple and robust. They are very simple to operate compared to Western tanks, and don't require a high level of training or education in their crewmembers.
Key.Chinese:
T-55 tanks were the main battle tanks of the Soviet Union after they entered service in 1947. Estimated production numbers for the series range from 86,000 to 100,000, making them the most-produced tank in history.
The T-55 tanks are mechanically simple and robust. They are very simple to operate compared to Western tanks, and don't require a high level of training or education in their crewmembers.
Key.French:
Les chars T-55 furent les principaux blindés de combat de l'Union soviétique après leur mise en service en 1947. On estime le nombre de véhicules de cette série compris entre 86 000 et 100 000, ce qui en fait le modèle le plus produit de l'histoire.
Les chars T-55 sont mécaniquement simples et robustes. Ils sont très faciles à manier comparés aux chars occidentaux et ne nécessitent que peu d'entraînement et de formation pour l'équipage.
Key.Spanish:
Los tanques T-55 fueron los principales tanques de combate de la Unión Soviética desde que entraron en servicio en 1947. Se estima que se produjo un total de 86.000 a 100.000 unidades, lo que hizo de este tanque el más fabricado de la historia.
Los tanques T-55 son de mecánica simple y robusta. Son muy sencillos de manejar, comparados con los tanques occidentales, y no requieren un alto nivel de entrenamiento por parte de sus tripulantes.
Key.Italian:
Entrato in servizio nel 1947, il carro armato T-55 è stato il mezzo più usato dai sovietici, nonché il più diffuso della storia, con una produzione stimata fra gli 86.000 e i 100.000 esemplari.
Robusto e semplice da comandare rispetto ai carri armati occidentali, non richiede un equipaggio particolarmente specializzato.
Key.Hungarian:
T-55 tanks were the main battle tanks of the Soviet Union after they entered service in 1947. Estimated production numbers for the series range from 86,000 to 100,000, making them the most-produced tank in history.
The T-55 tanks are mechanically simple and robust. They are very simple to operate compared to Western tanks, and don't require a high level of training or education in their crewmembers.
Key.Polish:
T-55 były czołgami podstawowymi armii Związku Radzieckiego od wejścia do służby w roku 1947. Szacuje się, że wyprodukowano od 86000 do 100000 sztuk, co czyni go najliczniej produkowanym czołgiem w historii.
T-55 są mechanicznie proste i wytrzymałe. W porównaniu z czołgami zachodnimi, łatwo się je obsługuje, a ich załogi nie muszą przejść gruntownego szkolenia.
Key.Russian:
Советский средний танк Т-55 является дальнейшим развитием танка Т-54Б, за счет высокой конструктивной новизны (среди прочего можно выделить автоматическую систему противоатомной защиты) получившим отдельное номерное обозначение. Наиболее распространенной стала модификация Т-55А, производившаяся в 1963-79гг.
Хорошие для своего времени ТТХ, а также относительная простота освоения и производства, сделали серию Т-54/55 самыми массовыми танками в истории, на протяжении полувека участвовавшими в многочисленных войнах на всех континентах, кроме Северной Америки и Антарктиды.
Key.German:
Der T-55 wurde nach seiner Einführung 1947 zum Hauptkampfpanzer der Sowjetunion. Schätzungen zufolge wurden davon 86.000 bis 100.000 hergestellt, was ihn zum meistproduzierten Panzer der Geschichte macht.
T-55-Panzer sind mechanisch simpel gehalten und sehr robust. Im Vergleich zu westlichen Panzern sind sie auch sehr leicht zu bedienen und erfordern bei den Besatzungsmitgliedern keine große Aus- oder Vorbildung.
Key.Czech:
Tanky T-55 byly poprvé nasazeny v roce 1947 a byly hlavními bojovými tanky armád Sovětského svazu. Odhaduje se, že jich bylo vyrobeno mezi 86.000 a 100.000 kusy, což z nich dělá nejrozšířenější tanky v lidské historii.
Tanky T-55 jsou ve své podstatě jednoduché a velmi odolné. Ve srovnání se západními tanky jsou velmi snadno ovladatelné a kladou minimální nároky na výcvik a znalosti své posádky.
Key.English:
T-55 tanks were the main battle tanks of the Soviet Union after they entered service in 1947. Estimated production numbers for the series range from 86,000 to 100,000, making them the most-produced tank in history.
The T-55 tanks are mechanically simple and robust. They are very simple to operate compared to Western tanks, and don't require a high level of training or education in their crewmembers.
Key.Japanese:
T-55 tanks were the main battle tanks of the Soviet Union after they entered service in 1947. Estimated production numbers for the series range from 86,000 to 100,000, making them the most-produced tank in history.
The T-55 tanks are mechanically simple and robust. They are very simple to operate compared to Western tanks, and don't require a high level of training or education in their crewmembers.

Key.Original: The M6 Linebacker is an air-defense variant of the M2A2 Bradley. It features two four-tube Stinger missile pods. The Linebacker is due to be retired from U.S. service.
Key.Chinese: The M6 Linebacker is an air-defense variant of the M2A2 Bradley. It features two four-tube Stinger missile pods. The Linebacker is due to be retired from U.S. service.
Key.French: Le M6 Linebacker est une variante du M2A2 Bradley dédiée à la défense anti-aérienne. Il comprend deux lance-missiles Stinger à quatre tubes. Le Linebacker va être retiré de l'US Army.
Key.Spanish: El M6 Linebacker es una variante de defensa aérea del M2A2 Bradley. Incluye cuatro lanzacohetes Stinger. El Linebacker va a ser retirado del servicio estadounidense.
Key.Italian: L'M6 Linebacker è una variante per difesa aerea dell'M2A2 Bradley, armato con due lanciamissili Stinger quadrupli. Ne è previsto il ritiro dal servizio negli Stati Uniti.
Key.Hungarian: The M6 Linebacker is an air-defense variant of the M2A2 Bradley. It features two four-tube Stinger missile pods. The Linebacker is due to be retired from U.S. service.
Key.Polish: M6 Linebacker to przeciwlotnicza wersja transportera M2A2 Bradley. Posiada dwie czteroprowadnicowe wyrzutnie pocisków Stinger. Linebacker ma być wkrótce wycofany ze służby w wojskach USA.
Key.Russian: M6 'Лайнбэкер' - зенитный ракетно-артиллерийский комплекс на базе БМП M2A2 'Брэдли'. Комплекс оснащен ракетами 'Стингер'. 'Лайнбэкер' отслужил свое и скоро будет снят с вооружения армии США.
Key.German: Der M6 Linebacker ist eine Flugabwehrvariante des M2A2 Bradley. Er verfügt über zwei Werfer mit jeweils vier Rohren für Stinger-Raketen. Der Linebacker soll demnächst aus dem Arsenal der US-Armee entfernt werden.
Key.Czech: M6 Linebacker je protileteckou variantou klasického M2A2 Bradley. Disponuje dvěma čtyřhlavňovými protileteckými řízenými střelami Stinger. Linebackery budou v dohledné době vyřazeny z aktivní služby v americké armádě.
Key.English: The M6 Linebacker is an air-defense variant of the M2A2 Bradley. It features two four-tube Stinger missile pods. The Linebacker is due to be retired from U.S. service.
Key.Japanese: The M6 Linebacker is an air-defense variant of the M2A2 Bradley. It features two four-tube Stinger missile pods. The Linebacker is due to be retired from U.S. service.

Key.Original:
The M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) is an US infantry fighting vehicle. It is designed to transport infantry with armor protection while providing covering fire to suppressing enemy troops and armored vehicles.
The A2 variant features improvements based on lessons learned during Gulf War in 1991.
Key.Chinese:
The M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) is an US infantry fighting vehicle. It is designed to transport infantry with armor protection while providing covering fire to suppressing enemy troops and armored vehicles.
The A2 variant features improvements based on lessons learned during Gulf War in 1991.
Key.French:
Le M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) est un véhicule de combat de l'infanterie américaine. Il a pour mission de transporter l'infanterie tout en fournissant une couverture de feu aux troupes et véhicules blindés alliés.
La variante A2 intègre des améliorations basées sur les leçons tirées de la guerre du Golfe de 1991.
Key.Spanish:
El M2 Bradley IFV (vehículo de combate de infantería) es un vehículo de combate de la infantería de EE. UU. Está diseñado para transportar infantería con protección blindada, a la vez que ofrece fuego de cobertura contra tropas enemigas ocultas y vehículos acorazados.
La versión A2 presenta mejoras basadas en lo aprendido durante la Guerra del Golfo en 1991.
Key.Italian:
L'M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) è un mezzo blindato per la fanteria. È progettato per proteggere la fanteria durante il trasporto e fornire fuoco di copertura contro truppe e blindati nemici.
La variante A2 è una versione migliorata grazie all'esperienza sul campo durante la guerra del Golfo nel 1991.
Key.Hungarian:
The M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) is an US infantry fighting vehicle. It is designed to transport infantry with armor protection while providing covering fire to suppressing enemy troops and armored vehicles.
The A2 variant features improvements based on lessons learned during Gulf War in 1991.
Key.Polish:
M2 Bradley IFV (Bojowy Wóz Piechoty) to amerykański transporter piechoty. Jest przeznaczony do przewozu piechoty w osłonie pancerza i wspierania jej ogniem przygniatającym żołnierzy i pojazdy opancerzone przeciwnika.
Wersja A2 została zmodyfikowana w oparciu o doświadczenia z wojny w Zatoce w 1991 r.
Key.Russian:
БМП (боевая машина пехоты) M2 'Брэдли' предназначена для перевозки и сопровождения пехоты и для подавления огнем живой силы и бронетехники противника.
Вариант A2 - модификация с учетом опыта войны в Персидском заливе в 1991 году.
Key.German:
Der IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) M2 Bradley ist ein Infanterie-Kampffahrzeug der US-Armee. Er soll Infanterie transportieren und dabei mit seiner Panzerung schützen, während er feindliche Truppen und gepanzerte Fahrzeuge durch Unterstützungsfeuer in Deckung hält.
Die Variante A2 hat infolge der Erfahrungen im Golfkrieg 1991 einige Verbesserungen erhalten.
Key.Czech:
M2 Bradley IFV je bojovým vozidlem americké pěchoty. Je určeno pro transport vojáků na bojišti a pro jejich palebnou podporu.
Verze A2 je moderní variantou původního vozidla, obsahující řadu vylepšení založených na zkušenostech z války v Perském zálivu v roce 1991.
Key.English:
The M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) is an US infantry fighting vehicle. It is designed to transport infantry with armor protection while providing covering fire to suppressing enemy troops and armored vehicles.
The A2 variant features improvements based on lessons learned during Gulf War in 1991.
Key.Japanese:
The M2 Bradley IFV (Infantry Fighting Vehicle) is an US infantry fighting vehicle. It is designed to transport infantry with armor protection while providing covering fire to suppressing enemy troops and armored vehicles.
The A2 variant features improvements based on lessons learned during Gulf War in 1991.

Key.Original:
T-34 production started during WWII in 1941. The tank is quite simple in comparison with modern tanks and thus is very easy to operate.
It is armed with an 85mm cannon and two 7.62mm machineguns.
Key.Chinese:
T-34 production started during WWII in 1941. The tank is quite simple in comparison with modern tanks and thus is very easy to operate.
It is armed with an 85mm cannon and two 7.62mm machineguns.
Key.French:
La production des T-34 a commencé durant la seconde guere mondiale en 1941. Ce char est très simple comparé aux chars modernes, son fonctionnement est donc très simple.
Il est armé d'un canon de 85mm et deux mitrailleuses de 7,62mm.
Key.Spanish:
La producción de los T-34 comienza en 1941 durante la WWII. Este tanque es realmente simple y sencillo de operar, si lo comparamos con las unidades actuales.
Esta armado con un cañón de 85mm y dos ametralladoras de 7.62mm.
Key.Italian: La produzione del T-34 è cominciata durante la seconda guerra mondiale (1941). Il carro è molto semplice da manovrare se comparato con quelli moderni. E' armato con un cannone da 85mm a 2 mitragliatrici da 7.62mm.
Key.Hungarian:
T-34 production started during WWII in 1941. The tank is quite simple in comparison with modern tanks and thus is very easy to operate.
It is armed with an 85mm cannon and two 7.62mm machineguns.
Key.Polish:
Produkcja T-34 ruszyła podczas II wojny światowej, w 1941 r. Czołg ten ma bardzo prostą konstrukcję w porównaniu ze współczesnymi czołgami, dlatego bardzo łatwo się nim kieruje.
Jest uzbrojony w armatę 85 mm i dwa karabiny maszynowe 7,62 mm.
Key.Russian:
Советский средний танк Т-34, производство которого было начато в 1940г., произвел революцию в мировом танкостроении за счет сбалансированного сочетания огневой мощи, броневой защиты и маневренных качеств. В совокупности с относительной простотой конструкции, позволившей выпускать данную машину в огромных количествах, это дает возможность считать Т-34 лучшим танком Второй Мировой войны.
Данная модификация, Т-34-85, созданная в конце 1943г. для борьбы с немецкими тяжелыми танками, оснащена более вместительной трехместной башней и установленным в ней длинноствольным 85-мм орудием.
Key.German:
Die Produktion des T-34 begann 1941 während des Zweiten Weltkriegs. Der Panzer ist verglichen mit modernen Modellen sehr einfach und darum auch leicht zu bedienen.
Er ist mit einem 85mm-Geschütz und zwei 7,62mm-Maschinengewehren bewaffnet.
Key.Czech:
Výroba T-34 začala během druhé světové války v roce 1941. Stroj je v porovnání se současnými tanky relativně jednoduchý, se snadným ovládáním.
Do jeho výzbroje patří 85mm kanón a dva 7,62mm kulomety.
Key.English:
T-34 production started during WWII in 1941. The tank is quite simple in comparison with modern tanks and thus is very easy to operate.
It is armed with an 85mm cannon and two 7.62mm machineguns.
Key.Japanese:
T-34 production started during WWII in 1941. The tank is quite simple in comparison with modern tanks and thus is very easy to operate.
It is armed with an 85mm cannon and two 7.62mm machineguns.

Key.Original:
The Aero L-39 Albatros is a high-performance jet trainer aircraft. It was developed in Czechoslovakia and was widely used for pilot training all over the world.
This L-39ZA version is armed with a GS-23L 23mm twin barrel automated cannon and S-5 unguided missiles.
Key.Chinese:
The Aero L-39 Albatros is a high-performance jet trainer aircraft. It was developed in Czechoslovakia and was widely used for pilot training all over the world.
This L-39ZA version is armed with a GS-23L 23mm twin barrel automated cannon and S-5 unguided missiles.
Key.French:
L'avion L-39 Albatros est un puissant avion d'entrainement, il a été développé en Tchécoslovaquie et a été utilisé pour l'entrainement des pilotes dans le monde entier.
Cette version, le L-39ZA est armé avec un canon automatique GS-23L de 23mm et des missiles non guidés S-5.
Key.Spanish: El Aero L-39 Albatros es un reactor de alto rendimiento destinado a ejercicios de entrenamiento. Está desarrollado en Checoslovaquia y es usado por pilotos de todo el mundo para sus prácticas de vuelo. Esta versión L-39ZA está armada con un cañón autático doble de 23mm y misiles no guiados S-5.
Key.Italian: L'Albatros L-39 è un jet da addestramento ad alte prestazioni. E' stato sviluppato in Cecoslovacchia, molto usato per addestrare piloti in tutto il mondo. Questa versione L-39ZA è armata con cannoni GS-23L da 23mm e razzi S-5.
Key.Hungarian:
The Aero L-39 Albatros is a high-performance jet trainer aircraft. It was developed in Czechoslovakia and was widely used for pilot training all over the world.
This L-39ZA version is armed with a GS-23L 23mm twin barrel automated cannon and S-5 unguided missiles.
Key.Polish:
Aero L-39 Albatros to odrzutowy samolot szkoleniowy zaprojektowany w Czechosłowacji i wykorzystywany do szkolenia pilotów na całym świecie.
Wersja L-39ZA jest uzbrojona w dwulufowe działko automatyczne GS-23L 23 mm i niekierowane pociski rakietowe S-5.
Key.Russian:
L-39 'Альбатрос' - учебно-тренировочный реактивный самолет. Он был разработан в Чехословацкой Социалистической Республике и используется для подготовки летчиков по всему миру.
Эта модель, L-39ZA, вооружена спаренной автоматической пушкой ГШ-23Л калибра 23 мм и неуправляемыми авиаракетами С-5.
Key.German:
Die Aero L-39 Albatros ist ein leistungsstarkes Jet-Trainingsflugzeug. Sie wurde in der Tschechoslowakei entwickelt und weltweit zur Pilotenausbildung eingesetzt.
Diese L-39ZA-Version ist mit einem automatischen GS-23L-23mm-Doppellaufgeschütz und ungelenkten S-5-Raketen bewaffnet.
Key.Czech:
Aero L-39 Albatros je vynikající trénikový tryskový letoun. Byl vyvinut v Československu a využíván k výcviku pilotů ve více než 30 zemích.
Tato verze, L-39ZA je vyzbrojena dvouhlavňovým automatickým kanónem GS-23L řáže 23mm a neřízenými střelami S-5.
Key.English:
The Aero L-39 Albatros is a high-performance jet trainer aircraft. It was developed in Czechoslovakia and was widely used for pilot training all over the world.
This L-39ZA version is armed with a GS-23L 23mm twin barrel automated cannon and S-5 unguided missiles.
Key.Japanese:
The Aero L-39 Albatros is a high-performance jet trainer aircraft. It was developed in Czechoslovakia and was widely used for pilot training all over the world.
This L-39ZA version is armed with a GS-23L 23mm twin barrel automated cannon and S-5 unguided missiles.

Key.Spanish: Líder del equipo de fuerzas especiales

Key.Original: Negative, support is not available at the moment.
Key.Chinese: Negative, support is not available at the moment.
Key.French: Négatif, aucun appui n'est disponible pour l'instant.
Key.Spanish: Negativo, soporte no disponible en este momento.
Key.Italian: Negativo, il supporto non è disponibile al momento.
Key.Hungarian: Negative, support is not available at the moment.
Key.Polish: Odmawiam. W tej chwili wsparcie jest niedostępne.
Key.Russian: В настоящий момент вызов поддержки невозможен.

Key.Italian: Fai clic con Alt per impostare la linea.
Key.Russian: Alt и щелкните ЛКМ, чтобы определить линию.
Key.Czech: Linii nastavíte klepnutím s přidrženou klávesou Alt.

Key.Original: Click on location to request support from.
Key.Chinese: Click on location to request support from.
Key.French: Cliquez sur un lieu pour solliciter un appui.
Key.Spanish: Haz clic en el lugar al que pedir soporte.
Key.Italian: Fai clic sulla posizione da cui ricevere supporto.
Key.Hungarian: Click on location to request support from.
Key.Polish: Kliknij miejsce, z którego chcesz otrzymać wsparcie.
Key.Russian: Щелкните по локации, откуда хотите вызвать поддержку.
Key.German: Klicken Sie auf die Stellung, von der Sie Unterstützung anfordern möchten!
Key.Czech: Klepněte na lokaci, kterou chcete požádat o podporu.
Key.English: Click on location to request support from.
Key.Japanese: Click on location to request support from.

Key.Original: Select this option to avoid getting tasks from your commander.
Key.Chinese: Select this option to avoid getting tasks from your commander.
Key.French: Sélectionnez cette option si vous ne souhaitez pas que votre commandant vous confie des tâches.
Key.Spanish: Elige esta opción para evitar recibir tareas de tu comandante.
Key.Italian: Seleziona questa opzione per non avere incarichi assegnati dal tuo comandante.
Key.Hungarian: Select this option to avoid getting tasks from your commander.
Key.Polish: Wybierz tę opcję, żeby nie otrzymywać zadań od dowódcy.
Key.Russian: Выберите этот режим, если не хотите получать задачи от своего командира.
Key.German: Wählen Sie diese Option, um zu verhindern, dass Ihr Kommandant Ihnen Aufgaben zuweist.
Key.Czech: Zvolte tuto možnost, pokud si nepřejete od velitele dostávat úkoly.
Key.English: Select this option to avoid getting tasks from your commander.
Key.Japanese: Select this option to avoid getting tasks from your commander.

Key.Polish: Odmawiam. W tym rejonie są sojusznicy.
Key.German: Negativ, es gibt in dem Gebiet befreundete Einheiten.
Key.English: Negative, there are friendlies in the area.

Key.Original: Cannot fire. That position is not in range.
Key.Chinese: Cannot fire. That position is not in range.
Key.French: Tir impossible. Cette position n'est pas à portée.
Key.Spanish: No puedo disparar. Esa posición no está a tiro.
Key.Italian: Non possiamo fare fuoco. La posizione è fuori portata.
Key.Hungarian: Cannot fire. That position is not in range.
Key.Polish: Nie mogę strzelać. To miejsce jest poza zasięgiem.
Key.Russian: Огонь невозможен. Цель за пределами досягаемости.

Key.Czech: Nelze střílet. Lokace není v dostřelu.

Key.Italian: Fai clic con Maiusc per modificare il raggio.
Key.Russian: Нажмите Shift и щелкните ЛКМ, чтобы установить радиус.
Key.Czech: Rádius upravíte klepnutím se stisknutou klávesou Shift.

Key.Italian: Fai clic per regolare la posizione.
Key.German: Hier klicken, um die Position anzupassen.

Key.Original: Shift-Alt click to abort Fire Mission.
Key.Chinese: Shift-Alt click to abort Fire Mission.
Key.French: Maj-Alt pour abandonner la mission de tir.
Key.Spanish: Clic Mayús-Alt para abortar Misión de tiro.
Key.Italian: Fai clic con Maiusc e Alt per interrompere la Missione di fuoco.
Key.Hungarian: Shift-Alt click to abort Fire Mission.
Key.Polish: Naciśnij Shift-Alt, żeby odwołać misję ogniową.
Key.Russian: Для отмены артобстрела: Shift + Alt + клик ЛКМ.
Key.Czech: Střeleckou misi ukončíte klepnutím s přidrženými klávesami Shift a Alt.
Key.English: Shift-Alt click to abort Fire Mission.
Key.Japanese: Shift-Alt click to abort Fire Mission.
